category: Product > materials, treatments and surfaces (including paneling)
description_html:
National’s Stitch It program allows customers to express their creativity and enhance existing products with stitched designs, creating a quilted aesthetic. This unique process is available on select wood side seating and lounge pieces, along with Whimsy impromptu seating and Toss pillows and cushions. With a variety of standard designs and sizes, the customer can add intricate or simple stitched patterns.

National implemented this unique process to allow customers to further customize products and offer a service that is unparalleled in the industry. National’s broad offering of patterns and sizes makes it an ideal solution to add a tailored design to standard products.

From grand scale to delicate, this unique capability creates a distinguished look and adds artistry. Choose from linear patterns or intersecting angles to add tailored design to standard products. Single and double stitch options allow for even more style versatility.

Stitch-it also offers a contrasting thread option that adds the illusion of additional depth with a splash of color. Complementary thread colors can be used to create monochromatic style. Stitch-it offers a variety of colors, patterns, and sizes to create a dramatic look or a subdued style.
